name: Butterfly or truck pillow poof
description:
This listing is for a girls butterfly pillow poof or a boys truck pillow poof. Please specify upon checkout.

My pillow poofs are about 16 inches in diameter by 8 inches high. They have a zipper hidden underneath the handle where the stuffing goes in. The zipper will also enable you to wash the pillow should it need a good cleaning.  If you live locally I can stuff the pillow for you, otherwise it will be sent to you unstuffed. It takes about 20-24 oz of fiberfill to fill the pillow depending on how firm or fluffy you would like it to be. I can ship a stuffed pillow but shipping will be $12.95.

I am now offering pillow inserts for the pillows. This allows you to take the insert out containing the fluff if you would just like to wash the cover. The inserts will also have zippers. The inserts are made out of muslin.

If you live locally please email me at joyfullysewnendeavors@gmail.com with an order so shipping won't be charged and we can arrange for pickup!

name: Design your own Pillow Poof
description:
Pillow poofs are made to order. Before purchasing a pillow please contact me at joyfullysewnendeavors@gmail.com so that we can discuss what type of pillow you would like.  Afterwards, feel free to purchase your pillow. It can take up to 2 weeks to finish the pillow depending on how easily I obtain the desired fabric so please have patience.
Steps to Order a Pillow: 
1. Let me know what type of theme you would like for the pillow (cowboys, robots, ballerinas, animals, etc.)  
2. This will then give me an idea as to what fabrics to look for.  After obtaining some fabric ideas I will email you pictures of the possible fabrics. Before I purchase a fabric I will need confirmation from you as to which fabric you like. Please let me know if you don't care for any of them and I will start searching again. 
3. Once a fabric has been chosen and you have submitted an order, I will order the fabric and get your pillow poof created!

My pillow poofs are about 16 inches in diameter by 8 inches high. They have a zipper hidden underneath the handle where the stuffing goes in. The zipper will also enable you to wash the pillow should it need a good cleaning.  If you live locally I can stuff the pillow for you, otherwise it will be sent to you unstuffed. It takes about 20-24 oz of fiberfill to fill the pillow depending on how firm or fluffy you would like it to be. I can ship a stuffed pillow but shipping will be $12.95.

I am now offering pillow inserts for the pillows. This allows you to take the insert out containing the fluff if you would just like to wash the cover. The inserts will also have zippers. The inserts are made out of muslin.

More pictures can be seen here:
https://joyfullysewnendeavors.shutterfly.com/

If you live locally please email me about an order so shipping won't be charged and we can arrange for pickup! 

Fabric available now: pink butterfly fabric, truck fabric

name: Girls Super Hero Cape
description:
A customized girl's superhero cape. You can choose either a super hero emblem, crown, Minnie Mouse or email me with other ideas. 
Girls super hero capes are available in pink or purple. The emblems for girls can be any of these combinations: 
Pink capes will have purple and lime green emblems with either pink, purple, or aqua initials.
Purple girl capes will have pink and lime green emblems with either pink, purple, or aqua initials.
Examples of these capes can be viewed at: 
https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.546657558723191.1073741832.540812459307701&type=3
Please let me know what initial you would like for the emblem, the type of emblem, as well as the color choices, when you pay through paypal!
I do not have any capes in my inventory as they are specially made for your superhero. Please have patience as it will take 1-2 weeks for your order to be completed.

All capes are made out of polyster material with felt emblems. Special no snag Velcro closures at the neck keep capes around your superhero, but will not stick to the cape fabric. 

Approximate Sizing:
Baby capes: about 13 inches long 
Toddler Sized: about 22 inches long 
Kid Sized: about 28 inches long
Adult small: about 40 inches long
Adult large: about 48 inches long

If you live locally please email me about an order so shipping won't be charged and we can arrange for pickup!
